title: Gemini LeBlanc
body:
Classic misdirection...
This is a zodiac skinline i've been working on, for fun. Saga of Gemini was a huge inspiration, also Mugler.... I picked Leblanc to represent Gemini because she prob have a vast knowledge of the world and I guess she have changed her looks and personality through the years to connect with people and to make them work for her in a way...hope you guys/gals dig the concept ty <3

https://imgur.com/33r9459

replies.body: Why does this make me think of something from Bayonetta

Where are her _tits_!?
LeB is not flat chested.

~~(also why isnt a gemini concept fishlike at all?)~~
(was thinking of Pisces)
Because Gemini has nothing to do with fish. They are the twins Castor and Pollux, and their element is Air.

I was thinking of Pisces.
I withdraw my secondary comment, but stand by my first one.
hi! well...in my mind Lb have like a ballet dancer type of body so I went with it.

Love the idea of a Zodiac skin line with different Champions personifying each sign!  Leblanc makes total sense as a Gemini and I dig the pseudo Bioshock vibes I'm getting from this.  I think a regal, "formal ware" look mixed with mythology lore could be really sick.

I think Teemo should get the Leo zodiac! I think he'd be so cute as a little lion!
When he darts someone, he could roar... and when someone steps on his shrooms, jungle music could jingle!

A zodiac skinline would be pretty cool (albeit astrology is humbug) and this concept art is amazing. Problem is Scorpio Skarner cooouuuld be a bit redundant ^^'
Edit: Well, Taurus Alistar probably would be as well (and others I cant think of right now), so making it sorta mystical should  be good enough.
Looks great, mate - perfect 5/7, would ba... buy!
i mean. if they did that then you will always know which is the clone
